articles.author: Liam Doolan
articles.title: Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 Community Pays Tribute To Akira Toriyama - Nintendo Life
articles.description: "The Dragon Ball community united as one"
articles.content:
The world this week is mourning the loss of the legendary manga artist and character designer Akira Toriyama, and as part of this, the online community of Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 is paying tribute.
… [+2080 chars]
